      • intToIp

        static java.lang.String intToIp(int i)
        Converts an IP in a 32 bit integer to a dotted-decimal string
        Parameters:
        i - The IP address in a 32 bit integer
        Returns:
        An IP address string in dotted-decimal

      • arrToIp

        static java.lang.String arrToIp(byte[] arr)

      • getNetworkDestinationMaskLen

        static int getNetworkDestinationMaskLen(org.openflow.protocol.interfaces.OFMatch match)
        Parse this match's wildcard fields and return the number of significant bits in the IP destination field. NOTE: this returns the number of bits that are fixed, i.e., like CIDR, not the number of bits that are free like OpenFlow encodes.
        Returns:
        a number between 0 (matches all IPs) and 63 ( 32>= implies exact match)

      • getNetworkSourceMaskLen

        static int getNetworkSourceMaskLen(org.openflow.protocol.interfaces.OFMatch match)
        Parse this match's wildcard fields and return the number of significant bits in the IP destination field. NOTE: this returns the number of bits that are fixed, i.e., like CIDR, not the number of bits that are free like OpenFlow encodes.
        Returns:
        a number between 0 (matches all IPs) and 32 (exact match)

      • getMaskLen

        static int getMaskLen(byte[] mask)
